Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293T cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: The interaction between the mutant and wild-type protein was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_001246875.3:c.395A>G.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA and protein were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Interaction between the proteins greater than 70%.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Interaction between the proteins less than 40%.
